abstract.p: Shares of Blue Martini Software rise 174 percent to close at $54.78 in first day of trading (S)

block.p: Shares of Blue Martini Software rose 174 percent to close at $54.78 in their first day of trading. The initial public offering of 7.5 million Blue Martini shares was priced at $20 a share. Blue Martini develops and sells software for Internet-based business applications like e-marketing and e-service. Its customers include Levi Strauss; Deluxe, the largest United States check printer; and Harley-Davidson.
